openGraph.title: Battery Charge Time Estimator
openGraph.description: Estimate charging time from battery capacity, charger power, and efficiency. Use quick presets for fast checks.

title: Battery Charge Time Estimator
description: Estimate the charging time based on battery capacity and charger output.
capacityHint: Check your device settings or product specs.
resultEmpty: Enter capacity, power, efficiency, and voltage to see the result.
copyHint: Paste the summary into notes or share it.
